UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Mechanism of antibacterial action of a synthetic peptide with an Ala-peptoid residue based on the scorpion-derived antimicrobial peptide IsCT.
Literature.Author: Lim SS, Yoon SP, Park Y, Zhu WL, Park IS, Hahm KS, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=1µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=1µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3001(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3543(MIC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2095(MIC=2µM)
